channel.title: New Computer
channel.description:
I just got a new laptop today WOot! =D but there is just one annoying problem..
The admin user was gg and I've changed it to my name in the user accounts part in control panel but if I go to explore C: the documents and settings part has documents and settings/gg and I need it to be my name and you cant just edit the folder it says "gg is a windows system folder and is required to run windows correcly" WDF... =[ all i want is for it to say my name so if anyone knows how thanks.
If anyone has any ideas and thinks it will help if I get a screeny say so and I'll get one and add it Cheers.

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

Ya thats it thanks I’ll check it out.

EDIT: Omg dude thank you sooo much for that link the people their are like 30 year olds that knows everything and they solved all my problems lol. =]

Read full topic

@awesom wrote:

Ok thanks but the link doesn’t work…

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

Yeah I said to my Dad I think we should do that but he doesn’t want to and he reckons there is a better way to do it…But I will probably do that if I don’t get a solution soon.

I just finished reloading and downloading all my stuff onto this one though rofl should have just rebooted before doing it =[

Read full topic

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I know what your talking about, my laptop did the same thing. I just kind of ‘deleted’ the computer and booted Vista back into it(the disk came with it).

Read full topic
